akn:content.akn:p:
§ 41. Repealed. June 25, 1948, ch. 645, § 21, 62 Stat. 862
Section, act June 15, 1917, ch. 30, title VIII, § 4, 40 Stat. 226, defined “Foreign government”. See section 11 of Title 18, Crimes and Criminal Procedure.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective Sept. 1, 1948, see section 38 of act June 25, 1948, set out as an Effective Date note preceding section 1 of Title 28, Judiciary and Judicial Procedure.
